Title: Provides standards for correctional facilities in relation to medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorders
Summary: Provides standards for correctional facilities in relation to medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorders and the testing for opioid use when an individual is first incarcerated.
LawCode: Amd §§45 & 505, add §506, Cor L; amd §19.18-c, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorders to incarcerated individuals in county correctional facilities
